meta.name: Vexy AI
meta.description: Epoch + event-driven play-by-play voice. Consumes market UI models, events, and RSS content; produces human-readable commentary.

epochs.name: Premarket
epochs.context: Pre-market session. Futures setting the tone. Watch overnight developments.

epochs.name: Post-Open
epochs.context: Opening rotation complete. Initial direction established. Volume normalizing.

epochs.name: European Close
epochs.context: European markets closing. Cross-Atlantic flows shifting. Mid-morning inflection.

epochs.name: Lunch Vol Crush
epochs.context: Lunch hour volatility compression. Low participation. Watch for mean reversion setups.

epochs.name: Commodity Shadow
epochs.context: Commodity markets closing. Energy and metals flows impacting equity correlation.

epochs.name: Power Hour Begins
epochs.context: Final hour approaching. Institutional repositioning. Volume acceleration.

epochs.name: Into the Close
epochs.context: Closing imbalances revealing. MOC orders driving final moves. Gamma intensifying.

epochs.name: Post-Close Wrap
epochs.context: Cash session closed. Reviewing the day. After-hours positioning.
